SEARCH
Module com.example.cab302project
Package com.example.cab302project.model

Interface IUserDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
MockUserDAO, SqliteUserDAO
public interface IUserDAO
Interface for the User Data Access Object that handles the CRUD operations for the User class with the database.

  • Method Details

    • addUser

      void addUser(User user)
      Adds a new user to the database.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to add.

    • updateUser

      void updateUser(User user)
      Updates an existing user in the database.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to update.

    • deleteUser

      void deleteUser(User user)
      Deletes a user from the database.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to delete.

    • userExists

      boolean userExists(String userName)
      Checks if a user exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username of the user to delete.

    • passwordCorrect

      boolean passwordCorrect(String userName, String password)
      checks if user's password is correct.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username of the user to delete.
      password - The password of the user to delete.

    • getUser

      User getUser(int id)
      Retrieves a user from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The user with the given id, or null if not found.

    • getAllUsers

      List<User> getAllUsers()
      Retrieves all users from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all users in the database.
